panels.title: 可分配的 CPU 核数

targets.query: SELECT bottom("value", 1) FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 FROM "cpu/node_capacity" WHERE (type = 'node' AND  "nodename" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/node_utilization" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/node_utilization" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: node
list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu/node_utilization" WITH KEY = "nodename"
